Package ui.level2.factory

Interface UI

All Known Implementing Classes:
ui.level2.factory.LoginUI, LoginUIChina, LoginUIMsia
public interface UI
An abstract class representing the login user interface. It extends JFrame to provide a window and implements the UI interface for UI component initialization. This class provides a basic login form with username and password fields and a login button. Subclasses are expected to provide specific frame initialization behavior.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addButtonListener()
    Initializes the panel containing the login form elements.
    void
    initDefault()
    Initializes the login process.
    JPanel
    initPanel()
    Initializes default frame properties.

  • Method Details

    • initDefault

      void initDefault()
      Initializes the login process. This method calls initDefault(), initPanel(), and addButtonListener() to set up the login UI.

    • initPanel

      JPanel initPanel()
      Initializes default frame properties. Sets the default close operation, centers the frame on the screen, and calls the abstract #initFrame() method for further customization.

    • addButtonListener

      void addButtonListener()
      Initializes the panel containing the login form elements. Creates a JPanel with a GridLayout and adds labels, text fields, and the login button.
